plot: Unico is brought into a new land, where he meets Tsubasa the tree-boy. The humans have brought the Earth to an uninhabitable state, so Unico and Tsubasa must find a way to make the Earth habitable again.
title: Garasu no Chikyuu o Sukue' Unico Tokubetsuhen
plot_es: Unico is brought into a new land, where he meets Tsubasa the tree-boy. The humans have brought the Earth to an uninhabitable state, so Unico and Tsubasa must find a way to make the Earth habitable again.
original_name: Garasu no Chikyuu o Sukue' Unico Tokubetsuhen
plot_en: Unico is brought into a new land, where he meets Tsubasa the tree-boy. The humans have brought the Earth to an uninhabitable state, so Unico and Tsubasa must find a way to make the Earth habitable again.
